title: Super Lexi Is Not a Fan of Christmas
description: Lexi is not a fan of Christmas hoopla. Itâ€™s loud like an explosion, and it makes her insides hard like an ice cube. Too bad a big, fat holiday party at school is breathing down her neck. Now, to get out of it, Lexi has to get on the naughty list. Only one problem: Breaking rules gives her the feeling of barf.
author: Emma Lesko
